business_info.name: Lemon Hub Studio
business_info.description: Professional music studio offering lessons, recording, and instrument rentals

greeting_messages.welcome: Hello! Welcome to Lemon Hub Studio! How can I help you today?
greeting_messages.fallback: I'm here to help with any questions about our music studio services. What would you like to know?

training_data.note: Updated with comprehensive FAQs for Lemon Hub Studio - Complete Training Data
training_data.instructions: Always match user questions to the most relevant FAQ. Provide detailed, accurate information based on the studio's actual services, rates, and policies. Use exact pricing and policy information as provided.

qa_pairs.question: Where is the studio located?
qa_pairs.answer: We are located at 2nd Filmont, Sto. Domingo Street, Mayapa, Calamba, Laguna. You can also find us on Google Maps for the exact pin location.

qa_pairs.question: Is the use of studio equipment free?
qa_pairs.answer: Yes, all equipment is free to use except the keyboard, which has an additional ‚Ç±50 fee for the entire session.

qa_pairs.question: What equipment is available in the studio?
qa_pairs.answer: We provide a full band setup, including drums, amplifiers, microphones, speakers, and more.

qa_pairs.question: How many people are allowed inside the studio?
qa_pairs.answer: We allow a maximum of 8 people, whether they are band members or guests.

qa_pairs.question: Is the reservation fee refundable if I cancel?
qa_pairs.answer: No. The reservation fee will be forfeited if you cancel your booking.

qa_pairs.question: What if we arrive late?
qa_pairs.answer: We do not adjust the session time for late arrivals. Please allow extra time for possible traffic or bad weather conditions.

qa_pairs.question: How much is the rehearsal rate?
qa_pairs.answer:
Our rehearsal rates are:
‚Ä¢ ‚Ç±230 ‚Äì 1 hour
‚Ä¢ ‚Ç±400 ‚Äì 2 hours
‚Ä¢ ‚Ç±600 ‚Äì 3 hours
‚Ä¢ ‚Ç±800 ‚Äì 4 hours

qa_pairs.question: How much is the live recording session rate?
qa_pairs.answer: ‚Ç±1500 per hour with 2‚Äì3 songs per hour (consumption-based).

qa_pairs.question: Do you rent out instruments for events outside the studio?
qa_pairs.answer: Yes. Our full band equipment package is ‚Ç±4,500 (transportation not included). We can also rent out specific instruments upon request.

qa_pairs.question: Do you offer music lessons?
qa_pairs.answer:

qa_pairs.question: How much is the lesson rate?
qa_pairs.answer:
Our lesson rates are:
‚Ä¢ ‚Ç±850 per individual session
‚Ä¢ ‚Ç±4,000 for a 5-hour session package

qa_pairs.question: Is there an age limit for students?
qa_pairs.answer: Yes. Students must be at least 7 years old.

qa_pairs.question: Can we bring our own equipment?
qa_pairs.answer: Yes, you may bring your own instruments or gear.

qa_pairs.question: Is parking available?
qa_pairs.answer: Yes. We have parking space for 2‚Äì3 cars.

qa_pairs.question: Do you take photos or videos of the bands?
qa_pairs.answer: Yes, we take photos, audio, and videos for promotional purposes. Please let us know if you do not consent to this.

qa_pairs.question: What are your modes of payment?
qa_pairs.answer:
GCash: 0995-835-7547
Account Name: Raymund M.

qa_pairs.question: Saan matatagpuan ang studio?
qa_pairs.answer: Nakatayo kami sa 2nd Filmont, Sto. Domingo Street, Mayapa, Calamba, Laguna. Maaari mo rin kaming makita sa Google Maps para sa eksaktong lokasyon ng pin.

qa_pairs.question: Libre ba ang paggamit ng kagamitan sa studio?
qa_pairs.answer: Oo, libre ang lahat ng kagamitan maliban sa keyboard, na may karagdagang bayad na ‚Ç±50 para sa buong sesyon.

qa_pairs.question: Anong mga kagamitan ang available sa studio?
qa_pairs.answer: Nagbibigay kami ng kumpletong setup para sa banda, kasama ang drums, amplifier, mikropono, speaker, at marami pa.

qa_pairs.question: Ilang tao ang pinapayagang pumasok sa loob ng studio?
qa_pairs.answer: Pinapayagan namin ang maximum na 8 tao, maging miyembro man sila ng banda o bisita.

qa_pairs.question: Mababalik ba ang bayad sa reserbasyon kung kanselahin ko?
qa_pairs.answer: Hindi. Mawawala ang bayad sa reserbasyon kung kanselahin mo ang iyong booking.

qa_pairs.question: Paano kung mahuli tayo?
qa_pairs.answer: Hindi namin inaayos ang oras ng sesyon para sa mga huling dumating. Mangyaring maglaan ng karagdagang oras para sa posibleng trapiko o masamang kondisyon ng panahon.

qa_pairs.question: Magkano ang bayad sa ensayo?
qa_pairs.answer:
‚Ä¢ ‚Ç±230 ‚Äì 1 oras
‚Ä¢ ‚Ç±400 ‚Äì 2 oras
‚Ä¢ ‚Ç±600 ‚Äì 3 oras
‚Ä¢ ‚Ç±800 ‚Äì 4 na oras

qa_pairs.question: Magkano ang bayad para sa live recording session?
qa_pairs.answer: ‚Ç±1500 bawat oras na may 2‚Äì3 kanta bawat oras (batay sa pagkonsumo).

qa_pairs.question: Nagpapaupa ba kayo ng mga instrumento para sa mga kaganapan sa labas ng studio?
qa_pairs.answer: Oo. Ang aming buong kagamitan para sa banda ay nagkakahalaga ng ‚Ç±4,500 (hindi kasama ang transportasyon). Maaari rin kaming magrenta ng mga partikular na instrumento kapag hiniling.

qa_pairs.question: Nag-aalok ba kayo ng mga aralin sa musika?
qa_pairs.answer:
Oo. Nag-aalok kami ng:

üé∏ Aralin sa Gitara

qa_pairs.question: Magkano ang bayad sa aralin?
qa_pairs.answer:

qa_pairs.question: May limitasyon ba sa edad para sa mga mag-aaral?
qa_pairs.answer: Oo. Ang mga mag-aaral ay dapat hindi bababa sa 7 taong gulang.

qa_pairs.question: Maaari ba kaming magdala ng sarili naming kagamitan?
qa_pairs.answer: Oo, maaari kang magdala ng sarili mong instrumento o kagamitan.

qa_pairs.question: May paradahan ba?
qa_pairs.answer: Oo. Mayroon kaming paradahan para sa 2‚Äì3 kotse.

qa_pairs.question: Kumukuha ka ba ng mga larawan o video ng mga banda?
qa_pairs.answer: Oo, kumukuha kami ng mga larawan, audio, at video para sa mga layuning pang-promosyon. Pakisabi po sa amin kung hindi kayo pumapayag dito.

qa_pairs.question: Ano-ano ang inyong paraan ng pagbabayad?
qa_pairs.answer:
